el:protected.el:luamain:
enigma.ConserveLevel=FALSE
create_world(20, 13) oxyd_default_flavor="b"
-- Floor Layer fill_floor("fl-light") set_floor("fl-water", 9, 4)
-- Item Layer set_item("it-trigger", 18, 0, {action="open", target="door2", invisible=FALSE}) fill_items("it-pipe-h", 1, 1, 2, 2) set_item("it-floppy", 3, 1) fill_items("it-pipe-v", 1, 3, 2, 3) draw_items("it-pipe-es", {1, 6}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_items("it-pipe-sw", {1, 7}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_items("it-pipe-ne", {1, 8}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_items("it-pipe-wn", {1, 9}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_items("it-seed", {1, 10}, {1, 0}, 2) set_item("it-seed", 1, 11) set_item("it-trigger", 8, 12, {action="open", target="door1", invisible=FALSE})
-- Stone Layer oxyd(11, 8) oxyd(10, 8) draw_stones("st-glass2", {0, 0}, {0, 1}, 13) draw_stones("st-glass2", {1, 0}, {1, 0}, 7) draw_stones("st-glass2", {9, 0}, {1, 0}, 9) draw_stones("st-glass2", {3, 1}, {0, 1}, 5) draw_stones("st-glass2", {9, 2}, {1, 0}, 9) draw_stones("st-glass2", {19, 2}, {0, 1}, 11) draw_stones("st-glass2", {17, 3}, {0, 1}, 5) draw_stones("st-glass2", {9, 5}, {0, 1}, 6) draw_stones("st-glass2", {10, 7}, {1, 0}, 3) draw_stones("st-glass2", {3, 9}, {0, 1}, 2) draw_stones("st-glass2", {17, 9}, {0, 1}, 2) draw_stones("st-glass2", {10, 10}, {1, 0}, 7) draw_stones("st-glass2", {1, 12}, {1, 0}, 7) draw_stones("st-glass2", {9, 12}, {1, 0}, 9) set_stone("st-laser", 8, 0, {dir=SOUTH, on="1"}) set_stones("st-glass2", {{19, 0}, {9, 3}, {3, 7}, {12, 8}}) set_stone("st-laser", 19, 1, {dir=WEST, on="1"}) set_stone("st-mail-e", 3, 6) set_stone("st-door", 3, 8, {name="door1", type="v"}) set_stone("st-door", 12, 9, {name="door2", type="v"}) set_stone("st-laser", 3, 11, {dir=EAST, on="1"}) set_stone("st-lightpassenger", 14, 11) set_stone("st-laser", 18, 12, {dir=NORTH, on="1"})
-- Actor Layer set_actor("ac-blackball", 2.5, 11.5, {player="0", mouseforce="1"})
oxyd_shuffle()
